dialogues.Clawhauser:
[1]O-M goodness! They really did hire a bunny. What?! 
[2]I gotta tell ya, you are even cuter than I thought you'd be. 
[3] 
[4]Oh, there you went, you little dickens! 
[5]Oh! Bullpen's over there to the left. 
[6] 
[7]Okay, you're gonna have to be patient and wait in line just like everyone else, Mrs. Otterton, okay? 
[8]Chief, uh, Mrs. Otterton's here to see you again. 
[9]Okay, I just didn't know if you wanted to take it this time, she seems really upset-- 
[10]I'm sorry, sir, I tried to stop her, she is super slippery. I gotta go sit down. 
[11]Here ya go! One missing otter! 
[12]Yikes! That is the smallest case file I've ever seen! Leads: none, witnesses: none-- and you're not in the computer system yet, so resources: none. I hope you didn't stake your career on cracking this one. 
[13]The murder weapon! 
[14]Yeah, `cause that... What does that mean? 
[15]Are you familiar with Gazelle? Greatest singer of our lifetime-- angel with horns-- okay, hold on, keep watching. Who's that beside her? Who is it? 
[16] 
[17] (finally notices ringing 
[18]Blue Rev.                   62. 
[19]Okay, we're sending back up! Hopps? 
[20]Chief Bogo! 
[21]Wait, is that Gazelle? 
[22]You have the app too?! Oh, jeeeeez! 
[23]Oh, yes of course! About that, sir... Officer Hopps just called... She found all of `em. 
[24]Um, they thought it would be better if a predator such as myself wasn't the first face you that you see when you walk into the ZPD. 
[25]They're gonna move me to Records. It's downstairs. By the boiler.
dialogues.Yax:
[1]Oooooooooohmmmmmmmm. Oooooooooooohmmmmmm. 
[2]Ooo, you know, I'm gonna hit the pause button right there, `cause we're all good on Bunny Scout Cookies. 
[3]
[4]Huh? Oh for sure, we're a naturalist club. 
[5]Nangi's just on the other side of the pleasure pool. 
[6]Yeah, some mammals say the naturalist life is weird, but you know what I say is weird? Clothes on animals! Here we go. 
[7]As you can see, Nangi's an elephant, so she'll totally remember everything. Hey Nangi, these dudes have some questions about Emmitt the Otter. 
[8]Uh, Emmitt Otterton? Been coming to your yoga class for like 6 years? 
[9]He was here a couple Wednesdays ago. `Member? 
[10]Yeah, he was wearing a green cable- knit sweater vest, and new pair of corduroy slacks. Oh, and a paisley tie. Sweet Windsor knot. Real tight. Remember that Nangi? 
[11]Yeah, and we both walked him out and he got into this big ol' white car with a silver trim? Needed a tune up. The third cylinder wasn't firing. `Member that, Nangi? 
[12]Oh, for sure. It was 29THD03. 
[13]Told ya Nangi has a mind like a steel trap. I wish I had a memory like an elephant.
dialogues.Bellwether:
[1]Oh! Yes right. 
[2]Congratulations, Officer Hopps. 
[3]Ya know, it's a... It's a real proud day for us little guys. 
[4]I just heard Officer Hopps is taking the case! 
[5] 
[6]And I sent it, and it is done, so I did do that. All right, well I'd say the case is in good hands! Us little guys really need to stick together! Right? 
[7] 
[8]Sir? If we could just review these very important-- Sir? 
[9]Ooo, I'm so sorry... sir?! 
[10]No, no! But, sir, you do have a meeting with Herds and Grazing... sir, if I could just-- 
[11]Oh, mutton chops. 
[12] We're in Bellwether's cramped little office. Nick and Hopps hover over her while she sits at her computer.  
[13]Where to? 
[14]There! Traffic cams for the whole city. This is so exciting, actually. Well, you know, I never get to do anything this important. 
[15]Oh, I'm more of a glorified secretary. I think Mayor Lionheart just wanted the sheep vote... But he did give me that nice mug. 
[16]Feels good to be appreciated. 
[17]That's a fun little name he likes to use. I called him Lionfart once. He did not care for that, let me tell you. It was not a good day for me. Yes, sir? 
[18]Oh, dear. I better go -- Let me know what you find. It was really nice for me to be-- 
[19]Officer Hopps, it's time. 
[20]Okay, thank you Officer Hopps, uh, that's all the time that we have. No more questions... 
[21]Oh, you did fine. 
[22] Hopps looks at the pamphlet. Bellwether sits across from her at her desk.  
[23]Our city is 90% prey, Judy. And right now they're just really scared. You're a hero to them. They trust you. And so that's why Chief Bogo and I want you to be the public face of the ZPD. 
[24]Judy, you've worked so hard to get here. It's what you've wanted since you were a kid. You can't quit... 
[25]Judy! Judy! 
[26] 
[27]I'll go ahead and I'll take that case now. 
[28]Get them! 
[29]Come on out, Judy! 
[30]We're on the same team, Judy! 
[31]Underestimated. Under-appreciated. Aren't you sick of it? Predators. They may be strong and loud, but prey out-number predators 10 to one. 
[32]Think of it-- 90 percent of the population, united against a common enemy. We'll be unstoppable. 
[33] 
[34]Well, you should have stayed on the carrot farm, huh? It really is too bad; I really did like you. 
[35]No! Of course not... he is. 
[36]Yes, police! There's a savage fox in the natural history museum. Officer Hopps is down! Please hurry! 
[37]Oh, but he can't help it, can he? Since preds are just biologically predisposed to be savages. 
[38]Gosh, think of the headline: "Hero Cop Killed By Savage Fox..." 
[39]Yeah, pretty much. 
[40]Fear always works. And I'll dart every predator in Zootopia to keep it that way. 
[41]Bye-Bye, Bunny. 
[42]What? 
[43]I framed Lionheart, I can frame you too! It's my word against yours! 
[44]And I'll dart every predator in Zootopia to keep it that way...
dialogues.Flash:
[1]Nice to... see you... too. 
[2]I am... doing... just... 
[3]...as well... as... I can... be. What... 
[4]...can I... do... 
[5]For you... 
[6]...today. 
[7]Sure.    What's the... plate... 
[8]...Number? 
[9] 
[10]
[11]
[12]
[13]0. 
[14]Sure. 
[15]I don't... know... What... do... you call... a... 
[16]Three humped... camel? 
[17]Ha... ha... ha... ha... 
[18]Hey... Priscilla... 
[19]What... do... 
[20]You call... a... 
[21]Three... humped... 
[22]Here... 
[23]You... go. 
[24] Manchas is driving when he's attacked from the back seat.  
[25]
dialogues.Gazelle:
[1]I am Gazelle. Welcome to Zootopia! 
[2]Wow, you are one hot dancer... 
[3]Wow, you are one hot dancer... 
[4]I am Gazelle, and you are one hot dancer. 
[5]Wow! I'm impressed. 
[6]Zootopia is a unique place. It's a crazy, beautiful, diverse city where we celebrate our differences. This is not the Zootopia I know. 
[7]The Zootopia I know is better than this. 
[8]We don't just blindly assign blame. We don't know why these attacks keep happening... 
[9]...but it is irresponsible to label all predators as savages. 
[10]We cannot let fear divide us. Please-- give me back the Zootopia I love...
